title.narrative: Support to the Climate Change Support Team of the UN Secretary General

description.narrative: The Climate Change Support Team, hosted by the UN Secretary-General, is being supported in "resilience" activities in preparation for the climate summit in fall 2014. The goal is to raise awareness and mobilize key actors from business and in developing countries for climate-resilient planning and investment decisions. In the coming years, many investments will be made in regions that are exposed to increasing climate risks. These include, in particular, rapidly growing coastal cities in developing and emerging economies. Much of such investment will come from the private sector. In order to strengthen the adaptive capacity of the affected population, it is therefore important to take a joint, strategic approach to investment and planning processes. Therefore, the application aims at bringing together high-level decision makers.
